title: Tuesday’s Travel News: Cool Cars for Guests and More About Hotels
text:
Our Tuesday morning hotel and resort digest, with deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
LATEST HOTEL AMENITY: A NICE RIDE
Guests at the Park Hyatt Milan have access to two Abarth sports cars, a 595 Turismo or 595 Turismo Cabrio. Though the vehicles must be returned to the property by 8 p.m., there’s no time restriction on how many hours they borrow them for before then — it’s possible to take them on a short spin around the city or on a longer excursion to the lakes district or another area out of town. Available through Oct. 31.
The Beaumont in London has a chauffeur-driven Daimler, once owned by the Queen Mother. The car will drop guests off anywhere within a mile of the hotel.
